agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Public Education TIME & DATE: 10:30 AM or upon final adjourn./recess Tuesday, February 12, 2019 PLACE: E2.036 CHAIR: Rep. Dan Huberty The committee will meet to hear testimony regarding school finance and the final report of the Texas Commission on Public School Finance. Invited testimony only. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
